seo.title: Services | SustainSage
seo.description: Explore SustainSage coaching focuses for UK relocation, confidence in the workplace, and career experiments.

hero.title: Choose the coaching focus that fits right now.
hero.subtitle: Each package begins with a consent-led intro call and adapts to your pace.
hero.note: Coaching is not therapy, counselling, legal, medical, financial, or immigration advice.
hero.primaryCtaAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage
hero.secondaryCtaAria: Skip to the coaching focus cards

overview.title: Coaching focuses
overview.subtitle: Pick the doorway that matches your transition. We can always adjust after the intro call.

cards.title: Transition coaching (6 sessions)
cards.for: For relocation, role changes, or returning to work after a pause.
cards.focus: We explore identity shifts, logistics, and support systems that travel with you.
cards.format: 6 × 60-min sessions over 8–12 weeks, online with optional check-ins.
cards.ariaLabel: View the transition coaching package details

cards.title: Confidence & voice coaching
cards.for: For speaking up in UK workplaces without losing your tone or boundaries.
cards.focus: We practise language, presence, and agreements for meetings, interviews, and feedback.
cards.format: 4 × 60-min sessions over 6–8 weeks with optional role-play recordings.
cards.ariaLabel: View the confidence and voice coaching package details

cards.title: Clarity experiments package
cards.for: For sensing next career moves through small, low-risk tests.
cards.focus: We design experiments such as informational interviews or trial projects that honour your capacity.
cards.format: 5 × 60-min sessions across 8–10 weeks plus light reflection notes.
cards.ariaLabel: View the clarity experiments package details

nextSteps.title: How we begin
nextSteps.subtitle: A simple arc that keeps you informed and in charge.
items: 20-minute intro call to understand context, consent, and desired outcomes.
Written agreement summarising scope, fees, safeguarding, and language preferences.
We schedule sessions in advance while leaving space to flex around your energy and commitments.
You decide after each review whether to continue, pause, or close the coaching partnership.

cta.title: Ready to co-design your coaching space?
cta.body: Share a snapshot of your transition and we will recommend next steps or signpost other support if coaching is not right now.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage

seo.title: Transition coaching | SustainSage
seo.description: ICF-aligned coaching for relocation or role changes in the UK, centred on your pace and consent.

hero.title: Transition coaching for relocation or role changes
hero.subtitle: Hold space for identity shifts, logistics, and the relationships that move with you.
hero.ctaAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about transition coaching
hero.imageAlt: Abstract illustration of moving homes with support

for.title: Who this is for
items: You are relocating to or within the UK and want steadiness while paperwork, culture, and language shift.
You are stepping into a new role or sector and need space to integrate fresh expectations.
You are returning after parental leave, study, or a sabbatical and want rhythms that respect care and work.
You juggle responsibilities across countries and want to align decisions with your values.

explore.title: What we explore
explore.subtitle: A mix of reflection and practical design, always co-created.

cards.title: Identity and belonging
cards.body: Name what stays, what changes, and how you want to introduce yourself in new spaces.

cards.title: Practical systems
cards.body: Design routines, agreements, and boundaries that travel well between homes and teams.

cards.title: Support circles
cards.body: Map allies, resources, and care structures so you are not carrying everything alone.

cards.title: Experiments you choose
cards.body: Co-create small tests to try between sessions with clear check-ins and consent.

structure.title: Package structure
structure.subtitle: Six sessions with space to extend or pause after review.
points: 6 × 60-minute sessions over 8–12 weeks, online or hybrid as agreed.
Session 1 focuses on context mapping and defining what support looks like for you.
Sessions 2–5 dive into themes you choose, with light between-session notes when helpful.
Session 6 reviews learning, agreements, and optional next steps or signposts.

questions.title: Sample reflective questions
items: What identities or responsibilities feel loud as you enter this transition?
Where do you want to hold firm, and where is there room to experiment?
Who needs to understand your boundaries for this move to feel sustainable?
What would a grounded first three months look and feel like?

boundaries.title: Boundaries we uphold
boundaries.subtitle: Clarity keeps the partnership safe and useful.
items: Coaching is not immigration, legal, medical, or financial advice.
We do not complete paperwork or make decisions on your behalf.
You choose the pace and depth of every conversation; we check consent before suggesting experiments.
If therapy or specialist support becomes necessary, we will pause coaching and signpost options.

cta.title: Start with a 20-minute intro call
cta.body: Share the move or role change you are navigating and we will map next steps together.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about transition coaching

seo.title: Confidence & voice coaching | SustainSage
seo.description: Coaching for bilingual professionals to practise voice, boundaries, and presence in UK workplaces.

hero.title: Confidence and voice in the UK workplace
hero.subtitle: Practise language, presence, and consent-based boundaries without pretending to be someone else.
hero.ctaAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about confidence coaching
hero.imageAlt: Abstract illustration of speaking with confidence

for.title: Who this is for
items: You prepare for meetings or interviews in English and want to sound like yourself.
You are navigating feedback styles, power distances, or microaggressions at work.
You switch between languages daily and want tools to pause, translate, or set boundaries.
You lead teams or projects and want steadier language for advocating needs.

cards.title: Voice and storytelling
cards.body: Experiment with ways of speaking that carry your tone, values, and cultural references.

cards.title: Language flexibility
cards.body: Practise switching languages or asking for pauses so you can think and respond with clarity.

cards.title: Boundaries and consent
cards.body: Design phrases and agreements that protect your time, energy, and labour.

cards.title: Grounded rehearsal
cards.body: Role-play conversations, interviews, or presentations with compassionate feedback.

structure.title: Package structure
structure.subtitle: Four sessions with optional extensions once you feel momentum.
points: 4 × 60-minute sessions over 6–8 weeks with optional voice-note reflections between sessions.
Session 1 clarifies current scenarios, triggers, and desired shifts.
Sessions 2–3 focus on practising language, grounding, and agreements for real situations.
Session 4 reviews learning, captures personal scripts, and plans next experiments if useful.

questions.title: Sample reflective questions
items: What conversations feel most draining or energising right now?
How do you know when your boundaries are respected or crossed?
What language helps you stay present when you feel you must translate yourself?
Where would feeling one notch more confident create the most impact?

boundaries.title: Boundaries we uphold
boundaries.subtitle: Support with clarity and care.
items: We are not speech therapists, accent trainers, or legal advisors.
We do not give scripted answers; you co-create language that feels authentic.
You decide how far to role-play or share recordings; consent can be adjusted anytime.
If workplace harm or trauma requires specialist support, we will signpost appropriate services.

cta.title: Try a 20-minute intro call
cta.body: Tell us the conversations you want to feel steadier in and we will map coaching options together.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about confidence coaching

seo.title: Clarity experiments coaching | SustainSage
seo.description: Coaching for people testing career directions through small experiments and reflective learning.

hero.title: Clarity experiments for career decisions
hero.subtitle: Design small tests to sense what energises you before committing to a direction.
hero.ctaAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about clarity experiments
hero.imageAlt: Abstract illustration of exploring multiple paths

for.title: Who this is for
items: You feel the pull to change direction but want data before leaping.
You have several ideas and need help prioritising without burning out.
You want accountability that respects rest, caregiving, or health considerations.
You prefer experiments over rigid five-year plans.

explore.title: What we explore
explore.subtitle: Curiosity-led experiments grounded in your reality.

cards.title: Criteria for decisions
cards.body: Define what a sustainable next step needs to include for you and your people.

cards.title: People and conversations
cards.body: Plan informational interviews, shadowing, or community chats that feel safe and useful.

cards.title: Trial projects
cards.body: Co-create small projects or volunteering experiments to test fit without overcommitting.

cards.title: Learning loops
cards.body: Capture insights, feelings, and data so each experiment informs your next choice.

structure.title: Package structure
structure.subtitle: Five sessions with spacious time for experiments between meetings.
points: 5 × 60-minute sessions across 8–10 weeks with optional reflection prompts via email.
Session 1 surfaces hopes, constraints, and success criteria for this season.
Sessions 2–4 design, run, and review experiments you choose (e.g. informational interviews, trial projects, co-creation labs).
Session 5 harvests insights, maps decisions, and clarifies ongoing supports.

questions.title: Sample reflective questions
items: What would make an experiment feel safe enough to try?
Which idea keeps nudging you even when you are busy?
How will you know if an opportunity is aligned with your values and capacity?
What support or boundaries do you need while testing options?

boundaries.title: Boundaries we uphold
boundaries.subtitle: Experiments, not promises.
items: We do not provide recruitment, visa, or legal services.
We do not make decisions for you or guarantee job offers.
Experiments are co-designed with your consent and can be adjusted or paused anytime.
If distress or trauma surfaces, we will pause and signpost therapeutic support.

cta.title: Book an intro call to design your experiments
cta.body: Bring the questions you are holding. We will co-create a gentle plan or recommend other support.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call about clarity experiments
